Comment: Having reviewed the same document, it definitely says Guatemala, meaning that his Withholding of Removal order only precluded him from being removed to Guatemala. Unless there's some other document that also includes El Salvador then this whole thing is just a farce.   According to [this legal analysis](https://cis.org/Arthur/Judge-Orders-Return-Alien-Removed-El-Salvador-Administrative-Error) there's no record of the actual order in the guys court case. There's only the document that you linked, which is essentially a memo explaining the reasoning behind the decision which *should be* documented as a minute order. If the minute order materializes, it's possible that the memo says Guatemala in error and the actual order says El Salvador, but in the absence of a conflicting minute order we're left to believe that Guatemala is the country that he was precluded from being removed to.
